node.html: Shcoop is a competitive party game where you and your friends can be put up against each other. I lead the project with a team of 3 developers, a designer and a project manager, who are all students.

Building a full digital eco-system for the company, including a front WordPress website, a full-stack MERN Web Application which integrated with Stripe's API. Web Hosting setup, Email setup, continuous monitoring, bug fixing and improvements. Hiring developers and designers to aid me with designing and developing The Locker Room's brand. Translating requests from the CEO into new features for the application. Providing technical support for customers.
Fully designing, developing, deploying and maintaining websites, web apps, mobile apps and hybrid applications. Manging clients, finances, projects and external contracting.
